messages.message: Incompatible KTXanimData and KTXcubemapIncomplete metadata. KTXanimData and KTXcubemapIncomplete cannot be present at the same time.
messages.details: Both KTXanimData and KTXcubemapIncomplete is present but they are incompatible.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
